column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////My husband and I went there before the big dinner crowd at 3:30pm
column2: but it was already so busy and crowded
column3: we were able to put our name in and preorder our pizza. We ordered the Malnati's salad and the classic Malnati's deep dish pizza plus pepperoni
column4: WOW!!!!! The best deep dish ever! They are busy
column6: so expect to wait for your pizza
column7: but well worth it. It is a little pricey
column8: so what! I would come back and I would bring my family. Â By the way
column9: we ordered a large pizza and we could only eat 2 pieces
column10: due to being deep dish each slice is big and thick! I will be ordering pizza for shipment to San Diego soon so my family can experience the deliciousness of Lou Malnati's Chicago!
